Name: Toy - Adorable Sculpture
Description:
After using the prop, the normal attack button is replaced with the transform into statue button.
Click the button to transform into a cute statue, and click the button again to exit statue state. Click the exit toy button to restore the normal attack button.
Description$english:
After using the prop, the normal attack button is replaced with the transform into statue button.
Click the button to transform into a cute statue, and click the button again to exit statue state. Click the exit toy button to restore the normal attack button.
